Entries.Mon: I miss the 80s. I haven't been born yet.
Entries.Thu: Man, look, I don't even know what kind of mushrooms I'm selling here. I think they look neat. That's all. If you eat them and die, that's on you.
Entries.Fri: I like people but I also don't like being around people. Only the right ones.#$b# %(you hear a very quiet 'You're not one of them)
